Articles.Content:
Eh... not particularly. I prefer ice cream.

TUBM likes chocolate ice cream over vanilla.

What can I say! Chocolate is plain better! ^-^

TUBM likes Nutella...

You know me too well^^

The user below me also thinks Castlevania IV is a masterpiece.

I have never heard of it. So no.

TUBM likes the acronym better than typing out "the user below me"

I prefer to type it out.

The user below me has been to four or more different countries.

True, Canada included!

TUBM has not used RSS.

No, unfortunately... all US for me... *sadface*

TUBM has never flown in a plane.

No, that's how I got to the 4 countries!

TUBM has never flown a plane.

You LIAR! I've flown! ...though never landed...

B-But I bet the user below never has either!

Virtual planes - took off, piloted, landed.

Model planes - took off, piloted, landed (hard, but non-destructive).

Real planes - never been in one. Yet.

The user below me is currently hungry.

True.

The user below me is smarter than me

How flattering^^ but no, I'm not smart at all.

In fact, I bet the user below me knows more about aerobraking math than me.

Hard to say, but since Aerobraking isn't my thing I'd guess we're about even.

The user below me is in college/university.

No, only in HS.

TUBM is in a relationship.

Correct.

The user below me understands at least one language originating from Asia.

No, I understand none.

TUBM is a active participant in the number war.

Correct. But I only post when it matters, i.e. not when the current streak is invalid

The user below me doesn't like young children.

No, I do like them, but not in a creepy way.

Also, I checked the time stamps. The current posting IS valid. Sorry!

TUBM owns a pet turtle.

Alright, whatever you say boss. Anyway, let's cut the chatter here before we get deleted for OT.

I do not, and never have. I wouldn't mind one though, turtles are cool.

The user below me is secretly a great white shark.

YES!

TUBM likes logic games.

True.

The user below me has made it to duna

And back

The user below me is interested in jet engines.

In their functionality, yes.

The user below me is now above me as well.

Up and down are relative, but I am above you.

TUBM has never even tried to do an Eve return trip and is a coward because of it.

False.

I tried, but failed miserably. Good thing it was a probe.

The user below me has never done a proper gravity slingshot.
